QuestData.Title: A Pocketful of Shells
QuestData.Description: You see the problem? No you don't.$b$bProblem isn't all these dang quilboar. Quilboar I can shoot all day. Been shootin' em all my life, since my pappy gave me my first gun. $b$bProblem is these pigs are tough. Tougher'n they've been before. Can't kill em like I used to, see? My new modified bullets just get stuck in them and they refuse to die!$b$bHere, take my knife. Go out there and kill some of the quilboar and get my ammo back. Then I can shoot the rest! I won't stop 'till there's none left to shoot!
QuestData.CompletionText: Pretty sure I'll have to start shootin' my dinnerware, and I only have three sets. Hurry up, will you?
QuestData.RewardText: Good! I can keep shooting, and they can't get to me! This is really the perfect setup.
